version_description: We update the app regularly so we can make it even better for you and your furry loved ones. Get the latest version for all of the newest features and enhancements. Thank you for using Wag!
We update the app regularly so we can make it even better for you and your furry loved ones. Get the latest version for all of the newest features and enhancements. Thank you for using Wag!
We update the app regularly so we can make it even better for you and your furry loved ones. Get the latest version for all of the newest features and enhancements. Thank you for using Wag!

The highly anticipated Wagopoly game, and your chance to win amazing prizes is now live. How do you win exactly? It’s simple! On every walk your dog will find a virtual Wagopoly piece in your neighborhood.  Collect a set of pieces to win one of the grand prizes! Some pieces will also be instant winners! What will you win?

- Introducing Wag Filters! Now you can customize the adorable photos from your Wag walk. Simply swipe through the filters to pick your favorite, and share it with friends!

- Wag Stickers! New to iOS 10 are Sticker-Packs to customize your messages! Check out the new Wag sticker pack in iMessage.

Happy Halloween from Wag! We've added some fun Halloween updates including spooky report card photo filters for your pup and a Halloween-themed GPS walk tracking screen! Also, check out our new stickers for iMessage!

iPhone X support.

What's New
· NEW Summer Filters! We've added some filters to spice up your summer. Check them out!

Bug Fixes
· If you were one of the unlucky few who noticed your pup's image thumbnail disappearing from the side panel, well, this is your lucky pupdate. He or she should always be there smiling at you now.
· We've also made a few more tweaks for better iPhone X support.
Signup flow improvements and some minor UI updates.
Added support for shipping payment.
Behind-the-scenes optimizations to improve your Wag! experience.
Signup-flow improvements to optimize your Wag! experience.
UI improvements to optimize your Wag! experience.
We update the app regularly so we can make it even better for you and your furry loved ones. Get the latest version for all of the newest features and enhancements! Thank you for using Wag!
Added report card filter optimizations to improve your WAG! experience.
In case you ever add more pups to your family, you can now update your profile in the app to reflect this joy! We also continue to make behind-the-scenes pupdates to optimize your Wag! experience.
Minor pupdates and added the ability to edit pending walks via the calendar.
Minor pupdates and UI Improvements to optimize your Wag! experience.
We've optimized the app for all current and upcoming devices and provided more convenient access to your upcoming Wag! services directly on the home screen.
We've made some pupdates to the Payments section in preparation for new devices and upcoming payment options. We've also done some yard clean-up on minor UI bugs.
We update the app regularly so we can make it even better for you and your furry loved ones. Get the latest version for all of the newest features and enhancements! Thank you for using Wag!
We've made some optimizations for iOS 12, fixed up our menu navigation a bit, and we've restored a button that went missing on the walk confirmation screen in our last release.
We update the app regularly so we can make it even better for you and your furry loved ones. Get the latest version for all of the newest features and enhancements! Thank you for using Wag!
Minor pupdates and UI Improvements to optimize your Wag! experience.
We’ve made some UI pupdates including a refresh of the walker profile screen.

We've made it easier for you to book walks with an all-new scheduling screen. Try it out!
We've also added more details to the Request Sent screen and added more flexibility when booking dates for Meet & Greets.
And, you now have the added convenience of booking walks at the bottom of the hour.
We hope you enjoy these updates and as always, thank you for using Wag!
We've made a few UI improvements including a redesigned walker profile experience.

"We update the app regularly so we can make it even better for you and your furry loved ones. Get the latest version for all of the newest features and enhancements! Thank you for using Wag!

Improvements include:
- Payments screen
- UI optimizations
- Support for future services
- Assorted bug fixes and refinements
We've made the home screen a bit smarter so that features and services most relevant to you are the easiest to access. Thank you for using Wag!
We've made it easier for first-time Wag! users to book their first walk.
We've made some improvements to editing and rebooking walks, and cleaned up a few bugs.

We are happy to announce that all pet parents are now able to use Apple Pay to pay for Wag! services!

We support Apple Pay with the following payment networks: Visa, MasterCard, Amex and Discover.

Please make sure to have an Apple Pay wallet with a card associated with one of the above payment networks set up.

Once you have a valid card in your wallet, you will be able to see the "Setup Apple Pay" button on the Payments screen. Apple Pay can also be configured as the default payment option here.

New Walker Profiles - Learn more about how awesome your walkers are! These profiles now display badges that walkers can earn based on achievements and compliments.

Compliment Badges - When rating your walker, you can now leave a compliment badge to tell them (and other dog owners) how well they took care of your pup.

We've also added more options for new Wag! users to meet with a walker before their first walk.

We've optimized some of our animations for newer and larger devices.

We update the app regularly so we can make it even better for you and your furry loved ones. Get the latest version for all of the newest features and enhancements! Thank you for using Wag!

We've optimized some scheduling screens so that you can get your walks booked faster!

We've also added support for some upcoming holiday features.  Thank you for using Wag!

Custom Tipping: Are you thrilled with the care your walker provided for your pup? Reward them by giving them the tip they deserve. With the latest app update, you may enter a custom tip amount, up to twice the walk price. Custom tipping is available only when you're reviewing walkers who've completed at least 10 walks.

You can now give a free walk to each of your friends, and you'll get a free walk when they complete their free walk!
We've also started highlighting the best times for scheduling walks based on our walkers' availability to make better matches for you and your pup. 

We update the app regularly so we can make it even better for you and your furry loved ones. Get the latest version for all of the newest features and enhancements! Thank you for using Wag!
Minor improvements to how you can book meet & greets with recurring walks.
Minor pupdates and UI improvements to optimize your Wag! experience.
Minor UI improvements and pupdates to optimize your Wag! experience.
We've made some updates to support our holiday features.
We've made a few end-of-the-year "pug" fixes. Thank you for an amazing 2018. We're looking forward to an even more paw-mazing 2019 with you and your pups!

We've fixed some bugs and made some UI improvements in the Media Gallery.

Aesthetic improvements to our walk confirmation screen and some minor bug fixes.

We update the app regularly so we can make it even better for you and your furry loved ones. Get the latest version for all of the newest features and enhancements! Thank you for using Wag!

Get your pup the walks they need and yourself the peace of mind you deserve! Is your regular walker unavailable? No pawblem! You now have the option to book a recurring schedule with a set of walkers instead of having to rely on just one!

You can now add your walks to your device calendar from the walk confirmation screen.

Minor user interface enhancements.

We've revamped our Sitting and Boarding booking flow to ensure the best experience for you and your pup!

We've also made it simpler and more intuitive to edit your walks and contact your walker directly from the Upcoming Services module on the home screen.

We update the app regularly so we can make it even better for you and your furry loved ones. Get the latest version for all of the newest features and enhancements! Thank you for using Wag!
We have improved the scheduling of Meet and Greets to help you find the right Walker for your pup!
Minor pupdates and UI improvements to optimize your Wag! experience.

We have made a few sign-up flow improvements, and general bug fixes.
Thank you for using Wag!
We have added better deep link support from SMS messages, and improved home screen performance. Thank you for using Wag!
We have added improvements to our signup flow, and fixed some animation bugs. Thank you for using Wag!
We have added deep links to show your scheduled walk, as well as a few minor fixes. Thanks for using Wag!

We have added minor bug fixes as well as UI improvements for creating Wagmoji. 
Thanks for using Wag!

We have optimized the home screen to look more vibrant as well as added better deep link support. 
Thanks for using Wag!

We have made some improvements to our report card filters, and fixed a bug with sharing report cards. 
Thanks for using Wag!

We have improved our in-app help section, and made some minor UI updates to our sign-up flow.
Thanks for using Wag!

We have made UI improvements to the sign-up process, and fixed a few minor crashes.
Thanks for using Wag!

We've updated the dog profile section, and you'll also notice a menu refresh. 

For parents of more than one pup, we're introducing new options to schedule walks for specific dogs. Coming soon to our other services!

As always, thank you for using Wag!

We've fixed a crash that some users were experiencing while booking walks with their devices set to military time and fixed a few other minor bugs while we were at it.

As always, thank you for using Wag!
Minor pupdates and UI improvements to optimize your Wag! experience.
We have improved deep link support for your dog profile. Thanks for using Wag!

Introducing a new Service View page for Wag! Walks. We'll be rolling this out slowly to all other services soon!

Fixed issues related to submitting change requests for Walks.
We update the app regularly so we can make it even better for you and your furry loved ones. Get the latest version for all of the newest features and enhancements! Thank you for using Wag!

Bug Fixes! Including:
 - dog photos in side navigation menu no longer appear squished
 - fixed an ordering issue with pin points on walk maps
 - fixed an issue that prevented some users from seeing their full receipt

Thank you for using Wag!

We are happy to announce that all pet parents are now able to use Apple Pay to pay for Wag! services!

We support Apple Pay with the following payment networks: Visa, MasterCard, Amex and Discover.

Please make sure to have an Apple Pay wallet with a card associated with one of the above payment networks set up.

Once you have a valid card in your wallet, you will be able to see the "Setup Apple Pay" button on the Payments screen. Apple Pay can also be configured as the default payment option here.

We've added a new screen that includes more detailed information about your Wag! services. Check it out in the Schedule and Past Walks sections of the app.
- Note that in addition to walks, you can now view all of your past sittings and boardings in your history.

As always, thank you for using Wag!

* We're streamlining the experience for contacting our customer support team.
* Fixed a bug that didn't allow users to specify a certain range of weights for their pups.
* Minor user interface cleanup and improvements.

As always, thank you for using Wag!

Daycare is now available nationwide! Wag! Hosts will welcome your pup into their home for the day - book today while spots last!”

Thank you for using Wag!
We're rolling out new ways to care for your pup, even when they can't leave home. Keep your app updated to find out when these services become available in your area!

We've added more flexible time scheduling options to our newest services and fixed some minor user interface bugs.

As always, thank you for using Wag!
This update ensures compatibility with the upcoming release of iOS 13. Thank you for using Wag!

We've fixed a bug for some users that were experiencing a crash when selecting walk times, and another that didn't navigate to the correct view when the app was opened via certain push notifications.

As always, thank you for using Wag!

This release includes minor bug fixes in our customer support flow.
Thank you for using Wag!

We've made some minor updates to scheduling and added some new checks to help prevent booking duplicate walks.

As always, thank you for using Wag!

We’ve improved the look and feel of the Past Services screen. View your service history, request a receipt, favorite and rebook your previous pet care providers.

Thank you for using Wag!

Introducing the Preferred Walker tab! Pet parents can now curate their list of Preferred Walkers. This tab is accessible through the side menu.

We've also updated the service details and walker profiles to make it easier to add/remove walkers from your Preferred Walker list.

We're introducing a new and improved home screen to help you do more with Wag! We've also made significant updates to our Sitting and Boarding booking flows to help you find the right Pet Care Provider and provide you with a more personalized experience.

As always, thank you for using Wag!

We're rolling out some changes to improve the quality and clarity of your home access information, which will allow Pet Care Providers to better serve your pups.

As always, thank you for using Wag!

Introducing a new experience to add clarity to the home access information you leave for your Pet Care Providers. 
Book a service today to see it in action!

We've added an easier-to-use calendar for booking walks and made several improvements to allow you to more easily manage services that you've already booked. You'll also soon notice a refreshed home screen that makes all of our services easier to access.

We've also fixed some minor bugs on our new home access screen.

We hope this continues to improve your experience with Wag!
We have made some minor improvements to inputting house access information. Thanks for using Wag!

This pupdate includes further improvements on the communication between pet parents and pet care providers.
We've also squashed a few bugs.

As always, thank you for using Wag!

We've made improvements that allow for easier access to your preferred walkers. We're also rolling out changes to make the walk editing and rebooking experience a little cleaner.

As always, thank you for using Wag!
We fixed a recently introduced bug that made the "book" button on the home access screen un-tappable for some users.

With Halloween just around the corner, we've added some spooky surprises. Trick or Treat your pup to a walk!
Also included in this pupdate:
- Increased character limits in the "How to Get In" section which allows you to add more detailed instructions if necessary.
- Calendar improvements when rebooking walks. 
- Minor bug fixes.

This pupdate makes it easier to access help articles within the app so you can find out more about Wag! services. Just look for the "question mark" icons.
We've also squashed some minor bugs.
Thank you for using Wag!

This pupdate fixes a bug in the calendar where Wag! services scheduled in the last week of a month may not have displayed correctly. Particularly perceptive pet parents might also notice that we've made a subtle change to the font throughout the app.

As always, thank you for using Wag!

This pupdate makes our home access screen even easier to use. We've also squashed a bug that caused an empty walk service drawer for some users and made several other performance improvements.

As always, thank you for using Wag!

This pupdate makes it much easier to re-book your preferred walkers. You can access this feature through the Menu -> Preferred Walker or Past Services. We've also made improvements in the way you edit existing services.

As always, thank you for using Wag!

This is a minor pupdate to fix a bug we found that prevented the chat experience from working properly for some users.

As always, thank you for using Wag!

In this festive fall pupdate:

We’re rolling out the ability to book walks on multiple days at once with different times for each day.
Improved compatibility with 3rd-party keyboards.
Improved photo capture and uploading.
Minor user interface polish.
Bug fix in our chat feature that caused a crash for some users.

As always, thank you for using Wag!

Just in time for Thanksgiving, we're rolling out the ability to choose your pet caregiver when you book Sitting or Boarding services.

As always, thank you for using Wag!

This pupdate makes it easier than ever to communicate with your pet caregiver right through the app!

We’ve also rolled out our new rebooking feature to all pet parents. Try it from the Preferred Walker or Past Services tab.

As always, thank you for using Wag!

We're with you as your pups go Dachshund through the snow this holiday season! This wintry update includes improvements to our repeat walk booking flow, more iOS 13 optimizations, and bug fixes. 

Happy Pawlidays and thank you for using Wag!
A minor pupdate to fix some small bugs. Thank you for using Wag!
Fixed a bug that prevented new users from signing up with Facebook.

We are always making changes and improvements to Wag!. To make sure you don’t miss a thing, keep auto updates turned on. 

This release includes bug fixes and improvements.

• Pet parents now have the ability to recommend their favorite walkers to other pet parents. You can recommend a walker by tapping on the share arrow from your preferred walker screen.

• Pet parents now have the ability to request repeat walks with their favorite walkers. You can request a repeat walk with your favorite walker on your preferred walker screen by select the repeat walk option.
Pet Parents in select cities now have the option to request private in-home dog training. Qualified trainers will now see these requests in their available services feed.
Introducing Wag! Now starting in the SF Bay Area! For a limited time, you can now request essential services such as transportation to veterinary services and pet supply shopping and delivery.
We've released a few bug fixes and improvements to ensure the app maintains a healthy coat.
This pupdate includes bug fixes and improvements. As always, thank you for using Wag!
We've made some bug fixes and improvements. As always, thank you for using Wag!
We've squashed some ticks and fleas in our undercoat. As always, thank you for using Wag!

You can now pupdate your dog’s profile to include their birthday, gender, and more! Head over to “My Profile” to get started.
Want to learn more about your favorite Caregivers? Check out their all new profiles -- including photos, badges, services, specialties, and more.

Woof! Ready to reconnect with your favorite Pet Caregivers? Visit "Past Services" to chat with your preferred and past walkers - no scheduled service required!
Exploring the app has never been smoother. The side-nav has a new look and feel, so that you can spend less time booking and your pup can spend more time walking!
We've been grooming our coat, your pup's profile has a whole new look and feel, and now it's silky smooth! We'd love to hear from you at feedback@wagwalking.com

Check out this new trick! You can now connect with 5-star Dog Trainers over super fast video calls from the comfort of your couch… which we can help Fido stay off of. Book a Digital Training today and let us know how it goes at feedback@wagwalking.com.

We've added the pawption to pay for your upcoming Training sessions with Apple Pay. Train on! 
We made it easier to connect with a licensed veterinarian through Wag! Vet Connect. Let us know if it scratches your itch at feedback@wagwalking.com

We've added the ability to write a Recommendation for your favorite Pet Caregivers via the Preferred Caregiver tab. 

Tap into your Preferred Caregiver profile and scroll to the Recommendations to help your favorite Caregivers stand out!  

Let us know if it scratches your itch at feedback@wagwalking.com.
We’ve made some bug fixes and improvements to our sign up experience, and it’s now easier to access the services you care most about.

We've made it easier than ever to book your favorite Caregivers straight from your Messages! Find out what dates and times work best via chat and tap "Book Now" in the top right corner to send a request.
We've also squashed some ticks and fleas to optimize your experience. Let us know if it scratches your itch at feedback@wagwalking.com.
We've squashed some ticks and fleas to optimize your experience. Let us know if it scratches your itch at feedback@wagwalking.com.
We've squashed some ticks and fleas to optimize your signup experience. Let us know if it scratches your itch at feedback@wagwalking.com.
We've squashed some ticks and fleas to optimize your experience. Let us know if it scratches your itch at feedback@wagwalking.com.
We've removed a tick that didn't allow bookings on the half hour on the clock. Let us know if it scratches your itch at feedback@wagwalking.com!
We've removed a flea that prevented some users from booking services while set to 24 hour time.

We've added cat breeds! Create the purr-fect profile for your pets to book drop-ins, training, overnight care, and more.
We've also added the ability for you to book all services (Walks, Drop-Ins, Trainings, Sittings, Boardings) with your past Caregivers!
For a secure and simple sign in experience, you can now sign in with a unique code instead of your password. Let us know if it scratched your itch at feedback@wagwalking.com.

We've made some pupdates so you can now find all your Caregivers on "Past Caregivers" & Services on "Past Services". We've also added functionality so you can manage & sort Caregivers. 
We've also made it easier than ever to book your favorite Caregivers by adding a Book button in Chat to book directly for all services!
Looking for updates on your services? We've refreshed the module at the bottom of the home screen that shows the current status of your service.
Pet Parents now have the ability to hand pick from the Caregivers interested in Sitting or Boarding their pets!
We've squashed some fleas and ticks to optimize your experience. Let us know if it scratches your itch at feedback@wagwalking.com!
We've groomed our coat and removed a few fleas to optimize your experience!
We've squashed some ticks and fleas to optimize your experience. Let us know if it scratches your itch at feedback@wagwalking.com!
We've squashed some ticks and fleas to optimize your experience. Let us know if it scratches your itch at feedback@wagwalking.com!

Pet Parents now have the ability to hand pick from the Caregivers interested in their weekly schedules!
Going away for the weekend? We've streamlined your pups profile when booking an Overnight request -- share the important details ahead of time. Let us know if it scratches your itch at feedback@wagwalking.com.
We've squashed some ticks and fleas to optimize your experience. Let us know if it scratches your itch at feedback@wagwalking.com!
We've squashed some ticks and fleas to optimize your experience. Let us know if it scratches your itch at feedback@wagwalking.com!

We've added some quick actions to make it easier than ever to book a walk, chat with your favorite Caregivers, and visit the Help Center. Simply long press your paw on the Wag! app icon and choose from the menu without opening the app!
Report cards also just got back from the groomers, and they're looking quite fetching! Check it out after your next service and let us know if it scratches your itch at feedback@wagwalking.com.

We've updated your experience so it's easier than ever to choose the pawfect Caregiver for your pup. You can now browse through interested Caregivers with the flick of a finger. Simply select Pet Parent match for your next recurring or overnight service and let us know what you think at feedback@wagwalking.com!
We've squashed some ticks and fleas to optimize your experience. Let us know if it scratches your itch at feedback@wagwalking.com!
